text: Yeah, I guess a system that would be able to transform very different languages back and forth would probably have to rely on machine learning. And possibly never be 100% accurate. But I was wondering if there are systems for translating somewhat similar languages by defining the translation once. I can imagine constructing the same AST from different (but similar) languages and then being able to print that AST to either language, but that's not defining the translation once.

elements.text: Yeah, I guess a system that would be able to transform very different languages back and forth would probably have to rely on machine learning. And possibly never be 100% accurate.
